snippet.title: Cinderstone Online Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1389520/
Subscribe to beta: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1389520/
Chat with us on Discord: https://discord.gg/aEkbXamxqT
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/FioresiaOnline

Cinderstone Online is a B2P MMORPG coming out on steam this year!

Unravel the story of Cinderstone Online, a cute and colourful MMORPG by protecting the world from the rivalry gods wanting their stolen lands back. Climb your way for glory, from farming, trading, conquering and becoming the ruler of a region. Join friends and be the leader of a great guild. Explore and find new locations filled with rewarding loot and mysteries to uncover.
